ygData.subject: RE: {General} Monster Con
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed the other night in Oasis when fighting white Orcs we were really getting hurt vs one MOB (would have died if the two of us hadn t zoned).  I think
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed the other night in Oasis when fighting white Orcs we were really
getting hurt vs one MOB (would have died if the two of us hadn't zoned). I
think they cranked up the difficulty in that area.

-----Original Message-----
From: rich.hitz@... [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
Sent: Friday, August 06, 1999 11:58 AM
To: enchanters; Enchant
Subject: [eqenchanters] {General} Monster Con


From: rich.hitz@...

My wife has been telling me that for the last couple of
days her Bard has been killed by MOBS the con blue to
her @ 10th level (ie. zombies, madmen, Orcs) in North
Ro. Prior to this she was able to take on 2-3 blues at
once but now 1 blue gives her a run for the zone most
times.
I do not know if this is true for my Enchanter per say.
My pets are dieing faster, but I usually don't die.
Anyone else notice Blues being tougher? Or is that a
Level 10 thing?

--
Artimis
2nd Rank Enchanter
Bertoxxulous
